Posts.Content: Hi, I also have breast cancer in liver. I was dignosed last October 2002. i have stage 4. the only treatment that I have taken is Femara. I seem to be doing pretty well at this time. just alot of pressure on right side under ribs. I went for a CT scan in June and oncologist said the tumors had shrunk some. Hope this note finds you well. God Bless You, Theresa
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer in Liver
